website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Moab Adventure Mid Waterproof is an all-around lightweight shoe for all occasions and weather. Its sturdiness does not overpower its supreme comfort.Waterproofing of the shoe only comes with the materials on the upper but not with the construction. Lacking gussets made it susceptible to the entry of water above the bottom of the laces when the water level rises.
pros: Comfort is top-notch with this sneaker cleat, many reviewers have commended
The Merrell Moab Adventure Mid Waterproof projects a stylish and good-looking image, for many reviewers
Many users like that they can wear it all day for different activities
The roomy toe box is a plus for some buyers
Few users have noticed that the sneaker cleat holds up well when being used consistently
There is no break-in time needed for this Merrell model, a few have shared
The Moab Adventure Mid Waterproof from Merrell is relatively lightweight for several wearers
A user have praised the sneakerboot's ample support around the heel
Many reviewers have mentioned that the shoe fits them perfectly
cons: A handful of wearers have complained that their feet got wet and explicitly mentioned that it is not waterproof
The absence of bellows or gussets made some users dislike its structure
A couple of buyers have noticed that there were tearing at the stitches

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my husband. They are to be Waterproof. My husband is a diabetic and its important that his feet stay dry. Yesterday after we had a storm he had been working in the yard for a couple of hours and was in some water . These leaked around the sides and toes and his feet were soaked. He had worn them about a month. I am so disappointed as they #1. are expensive. #2. The Merrell Brand is noted for being an exceptional boot/footwear. This may be a defective pair? Not sure. But I would not purchase it again. He has several pairs of merrells that are great. However these boots are not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO BELLOWS TONGUE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boot, with one exception which was a deal breaker for me-IT DOES NOT HAVE A BELLOWS TONGUE. The tongue is attached at the toe only, which means that all kinds of debris and even water will eventually find its way into the boot. I don't understand why Merrell went to all the trouble of putting a waterproof liner into the boot and then not go to a little extra effort to put in a bellow tongue. it fit very well (runs a little small) but I had to return it. Some mysteries will never be solved...
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality not what I expected from Merrell. Photo speaks for itself. These boots have less than 50 miles on them. The affected area is a relatively low stress point...glad I didn't try a long hike with them...not sure where they'll fail next.... Merrell's "Make it Right Guarantee" is only good for 60 days, so guess I get to pay for re-stitching....
customer_reviews.author: Hanshan

customer_reviews.title: Like others remarked it lacks the bellows tongue
customer_reviews.text: Merrell has really cheapened their quality. Like others remarked it lacks the bellows tongue. The top speed lace hook are cheap plastic instead of metal. They don't fit well like the original moab's did. These are way too loose in the heel and cause my foot to slide. The insoles are very thin and cheap compared to the nice insoles merrell used to put in their shoes. I am disappointed in merrell and I sent them back. Love amazon for the wonderful return policy!
customer_reviews.author: Sheepies96

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great hiker
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and worn Merrell hikers for longer than I can remember. These are a very nice, comfortable boot. I would however, consider this a light weight hiker. As others have pointed out, there is no gusset on the tongue. This would call in to question the overall waterproof level these hikers could sustain. For me, I wear them as an everyday boot to work and not as a hard core hiking boot. Should manage everyday rain and snow here in the Norhteast. Well worth the money and as comfortable as any Merrell I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: cgabe10

customer_reviews.title: Big toe box
customer_reviews.text: I had to return & replace exactly 1/2 size larger and now fit as if my regular size. Toe box is large which I need for my foot and the center section of boot is slender which I also need. Easy on because there's no bellows on tongue. I guess I wouldn't where if constantly hiking through puddles or alike. Comfortable right out of the box which Merrels are sorta known for. A short break-in period might be necessary if your a hard core hiker
customer_reviews.author: fish24/7

customer_reviews.title: Better sole shape and support than expected for a soft boot.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model that wasn't as nice but was just supposed to be a temporary replacement for some Timberland ACTs that I really liked. 5 years later I decided that even though they're soft these Merrells hold up amazingly well. So I bought this pair. I was pleasantly surprised to get a more supportive sole like I originally wanted but didn't find. So no complaints at all, got exactly what I wanted, and got the size right on the first try thanks to already owning a pair of the brand. I wear about 8.5 in running shoes and 7.5 in army boots, but need a 9 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Morris

customer_reviews.title: shoe strings were too short when boot arrived and had ...
customer_reviews.text: shoe strings were too short when boot arrived and had to purchase longer strings. Leather dry and not as much quality as first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Hot, not waterproof, seams give way
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Lightweight with comfortable padding. I realize these are waterproof, I always get waterproof boots. This boot is much hotter to wear than most - maybe it just needs to break in, I’m not sure. Update: After 10 months of light use hiking, one of the seams have pulled completely out. Boots are still hot to wear, and despite the name saying "waterproof" - they are absolutely not waterproof at all. Cannot recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E Beaty

customer_reviews.title: A raised version of the shoe--wtpf makes it tight.
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight. Have the shoe version in non-wtpf and it is great. Tried the shoe version in wtpf and it was tight. Not sure I am going to keep this, it is only the shoe version, extended higher but does not have bellows tongue. Waiting for a Moab mid ventilator to arrive so I can decide whether to keep or not. The wtpf could be too hot. They don't have a wide version yet, it seems, so a non-wtpf could be my solution. On the shoe version, I used Mink Oil to make it wtpf.
customer_reviews.author: Backbutton

customer_reviews.title: Rubber started coming off the sole in chunks less than a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Merrell shoes and the moab is my favorite. I have never had significant issues with the other variants of the moab and I thought that with the full leather upper it would last longer than the other styles. I was disappointed however when only a couple weeks after purchasing them the rubber began to peel off the bottom in chunks. I haven't had that problem before. Now it looks like my $150 pair off shoes is going to have a short life.
customer_reviews.author: kendric ramer

customer_reviews.title: Break in Required
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot. Took about 2 weeks of everyday wear and about 20 miles of short hikes to completely break in. They look even better when the are broke in. They are waterproof unless water gets over toe and on the lower part of the tongue. They are warm enough for cool weather and not to hot during warmer weather. They fit just like all the previous Merrell boots I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like it was
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the last version of this boot. Seems to run small. Debris gets into the boot because of the lame tongue, which by the way has left me speechless. It’s funny how once something that was seemingly perfect gets an update an now is sh*t.
customer_reviews.author: RSTS

customer_reviews.title: Casual look
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces hoops disconnected on both boots. contacted Merrell. they sent me a new pair, in return I sent them back to amazon for a refund. Amazon charged me a restocking fee of 28.00 when it was free returns. so now, my refund is 111.93 instead of 139.95. If the item is damaged after the return date, Amazon will steal your money to benefit the company. be aware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale m.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first these boots were great. Perfect fit and comfortable to walk all day. Three weeks later two of the eyelets came apart and fell off the laces. Luckily they came apart before the return time was up! Merrell quality isn't like it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bilbirk

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for just about anything
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great boot. Very comfortable and supportive. They are tough enough for hiking but stylish enough to wear with jeans or khakis. Only negative is the lack of tongue gussets which kind of defeats the waterproof feature but would probably only be an issue in deeper water or if you spent a long time in a driving rain. If not for this, would have been a 5-star rating rather than a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: This boot replaced the older version - the Moab Rover. I owned a pair of the Rovers and they held up admirably over two and a half years as a daily work boot. The Adventure, on the other hand, did not. After less than one year, the stitching is failing. It's a comfortable boot but the construction is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: pkyy017

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair, worn every day, great boot for working all day on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: These boots take a beating, worn everyday for work in all kinds of conditions, after about a year they start to breakdown a bit so I usually purchase another pair for when these are no longer wearable. Very comfortable and light enough that I don"t know they are on. But don"t get me wrong, you do have to take care of them and use a good leather conditioner about every 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jeff blakesley

customer_reviews.title: I love Merrell shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I bought my first pair of Merrill light weight hiking shoes I've been addicted to Merrells. Their size 12 last fit's my foot like it was custom-made. I have several pairs of both low- and mid-cut hiking shoes. I think they're the best brand for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rustad

customer_reviews.title: Not well made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for husband who is deployed overseas. They torn off the first time he wore them. Contacting warranty department, will see how reliable are they.
customer_reviews.author: shop_theraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like them at first but they have grown on me. Needs a shoe horn to keep from breaking the back down when putting them on. Same for the last Keen shoes I had. Great traction in snow and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Hemlockfen

customer_reviews.title: Should be labeled "water resistant" instead
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 3 star for their effort but it should be relabeled, "water resistant" and not waterproof. It has been raining hard here in the last couple days. Had about 2in-4in in some deep area and running water. Water somehow got in from the top where the lace are and of course the inside of the shoe got wet.
customer_reviews.author: buy everything

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Daily Wear
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable boot with much better traction than the last pair of Merrells I purchased. The Vibram sole makes a big difference. The insert that came with it was thin and cheap compared to my previous pair. I didn't like wearing them till I changed it out for something better. I ended up using the insert from my previous Merrell boots.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Weak Stitches
customer_reviews.text: Merrell needs to improve strengthening the stitches or discontinue this footwear model. I see others Merrell boots that have caught my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Boots are awesome. They have a high insole which I need
customer_reviews.text: Boots are awesome. They have a high insole which I need. Very comfortable I wear them all day and they help with my back issues
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mid hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have come to expect from Merrell. Bought my first hiking shoe 4 years ago and they have held up for all day wear. This mid pair is comfortable, good looking and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G

customer_reviews.title: The biggest fault with this shoe is that the tongue ...
customer_reviews.text: The biggest fault with this shoe is that the tongue is not attached at the sides. Which means that water will have no problem getting in your shoe, and you have to pull it back up when putting your shoes on each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits real nice and is comfortable all day. I also like the black which makes it look less like a boot
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit right out of box. Very comfortable. Wore in the snow and they are waterproof. A little bit on the heavy side, but worth the weight because they feel like they swaddle my feet and offer very good support. Haven’t taken them on any long hikes yet so I can’t report on their performance.
customer_reviews.author: Giomezzo

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I had previously bought Merrill shoes. These, however, proved to be annoyingly uncomfortable in the toe area. One of the risks of buying shoes on-line, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great first pair of Merrell's
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I was looking for. Right out of the box the style, color, fit, wear (so far) have been the best I have ever owned. I highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Jimi B

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on December 6 2019 and look at the left toe..it's January 31, 2020...thought they would last longer than a month!!
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Haven’t been exposed to water yet so I don’t know about being waterproof
customer_reviews.author: redbeard

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft leather with the same sole as that on ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft leather with the same sole as that on my Merrill Moab Ventilators. Very comfortable and stylish and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in January and stitching has already started to come apart 2 months later
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This boot is a total disappointment. The front seam on the boot has come apart and the boots were never waterproof. I have purchased several pairs of Merrill’s and have always been more than satisfied. This pair was purchased in Nov 2019 and now, 7 months later needs to be replaced. Contacted seller they say the boots are too worn to replace since they were delivered in Dec 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great boot and comfortable. Then I found out it has no traction. Maybe I should have sanded off the sheen on the plastic sole. Anyway, its a dangerous boot to wear on wet rock. Unfortunately a year has passed since new and now the front toe and sides are coming apart on both boots. Vietnamese work just ain't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood Garage

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Like all Merrill boots it is very comfortable out of the box. A fine looking boot as opposed to so many that are apparently designed for kids with bizarre colors and patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence L. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots to replace an older pair of Merrells. These are a lighter duty boot than I have used in the past for my hiking, but I might like them better. They are so much lighter and more comfortable than my old pair. It felt like I was wearing sneakers. They were tough enough to make it through one summer of hikes so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hohum911

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Have probably gone through 6 or 7 pairs in the last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: marc lee

customer_reviews.title: Know how wide you actually need before you make your purchase
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe for walking. I'm on construction sites a few days a week and these work well.
customer_reviews.author: BVJim

customer_reviews.title: All terrain approved
customer_reviews.text: Confortable and totally waterproof boots. Could walk on rought terrain for an entire work shift without feeling uncomfortable. When it finally rained; waterproof technology keep my feet dry on the wettest of days. I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Clovis Albelo

customer_reviews.title: Where's the gusset?
customer_reviews.text: As a carpenter I get debris and sawdust all over my shoes and walk in plenty of water. Having no gusseted tongue to keep debris and water out was a deal breaker, nice fit otherwise. Amazon makes it exceptionally easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Merrell isn't what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I've always trusted Merrell to send a good product but I may have to look elsewhere now...first day I wore them, the plastic (used to be stee) lace buckle at top broke...
customer_reviews.author: William Conner

customer_reviews.title: Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 12 1/2 usually which as everyone who wears a 12 or better knows, shoe companies refuse to accommodate us. The nice thing about Merrel is they run about a half size large. The last pair I had lasted me 3 1/2 years. For me, a man who works for a living, that’s a stretch when it comes to shoes. Great fit. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes them and he’s real particular on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The thing I miss is not having a pull tab on the back of boot to assist with getting it on. It was always a huge help. I was able to wear them all day right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: N Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Water resistant. Comfortable. Perfect for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the best work shoes I have found
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best work shoes I have found. Sitting, walking, job sites, etc. I have a black and brown pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: It's pure love....
customer_reviews.text: Yep, the tongue doesn't have a gusset, but these are the most comfortable hiking/work shoe I can find.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof by any means. Feet soaked in wet grass day one.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn B

customer_reviews.title: Merrill quality is lacking in 2020
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Merrill Moab boots that have pretty much fallen apart in just two months. As a parcel package driver, I buy a new pair of Merrill boots every April and they last for nearly a year. These boots are just over two months old. They still are very comfortable but literally fallen apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bogart

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes warrenty sucks
customer_reviews.text: Lovr thr shoes comfort and fit. The top lace hook broke off each shoe on one side. tried to return and was told they had to be returned unworn and in the original box. I guess once you wear them they are yours. not happy will not buy from peltz shoes ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rosenberger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot for mid-range hiking
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome for those of us who need some foot tlc but still go at a hike hard.
customer_reviews.author: Gonealoha

customer_reviews.title: Great brand I’ve had 6 pairs some different styles fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brand I’ve had 6 pairs some different styles fit always great quality great. Only shoe I consider these days.
customer_reviews.author: DustBoy

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect doesn't happen first time that often
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt service size was exactly as ordered finding shoes that fit well is a chore because I have one foot that's only half there so I have to use an insert an I usually walk out of almost every shoe I try. These were perfect doesn't happen first time that often.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite boots. Very confortable and look great.
customer_reviews.author: 2Edge Sword

customer_reviews.title: These boot look good, fit well, and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. He doesn't want to take them off. He said they are so comfortable. I noticed he gets lots of compliments on them too.
customer_reviews.author: ph ep 267

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as the last pair. Seems to not have as much cushion while I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Does it matter?

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these for years and really like them that’s why I keep ordering them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: The waterproof function is not good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's a pity, because the waterproof function is not good enough. Merrell did not consider the waterproof structure of the tongue is very important. It is as if you have done the waterproofing of the roof very well, but let the water come through the gate...
customer_reviews.author: Wayland T.

customer_reviews.title: I have the same boot in brown.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these in brown several months ago and wear them regularly. They are awesome so I decided I'd get the black ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M Belisle

customer_reviews.title: Just tried on to make sure fit was right!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten a chance to use the boots yet. They fit as expected and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect width.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots and very confortable. Perfect size and they look very strong. Its use in time will say the rest about its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Duque

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes,have been a fan of merrells for years.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: It's Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting. My chosen brand of shoe. I've always been happy with the brand, and these didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size larger, but it turned out to be too large, had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Kagi42

customer_reviews.title: Wet feet and poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work outdoors. Had six inches of snow recently and my feet were soaked. Sitting water inside the shoes when I took them off. Also after a week the toe is peeling and some stitching is loosening. Couldn't be less impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this boots for work but there are so nice and confortable that I will keep it for dayly used
customer_reviews.author: Harald Gantenbein

customer_reviews.title: Good looking comfortable boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the most comfortable boots I’ve ever worn! I use them for work and my feet feel great all day long! I would highly recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: hb88

customer_reviews.title: Construction
customer_reviews.text: Need to work on the stiching. Comes apart after 3 months on a construction site. Probably only last 6 months if you're going hiking. Aside from that, very comfortable and the light weight helps!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Made with eyelets for laces
customer_reviews.text: I like that these shoes have eyelets instead of cloth loops that the laces go thru. The cloth loops do not last compared to the eyelets so these last much longer than other versions.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Seck

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. I wear them pretty much every day
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve purchased. They are very comfortable. I wear them pretty much every day. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Brien Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great show. Width great Height in toe box was a bit to much but it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: hubby doesn't want to take them off!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, my hubby doesn't want to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: High vs Mid hight
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn Merrell boots but normally a higher boot. This is my first mud boot but so far I am impressed. Taking a trip to Montana to do some hiking....i’ll report after that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of work boots
customer_reviews.text: These Merrell boots are great, I had 2 pair before this purchase. could not find at the store last purchased from so my wide found on Amazon, excellent price so I bought 2 new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, support and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these boots for everyday use as well as hiking for over a year now with well over a 1,000 miles on them and they are still in good usable shape. They are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Wears like iron!
customer_reviews.text: They fit awesome and wear like iron, Vibrum is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lessard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a comfortable pair of mid-height, waterproof hiking shoes. Merrell delivered.
customer_reviews.author: A. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of boots.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my son to use when deployed. He loves the boots. Very comfortable. Good fit. No complaints. Has used the same boot in the past and they held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Suho

customer_reviews.title: Solid waterproof hiking boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots...light weight and warm. Require very little break-in required. A great purchase
customer_reviews.author: TheRaven

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is my number one footwear. It is great for casual, work, etc. Very comfortable and lite on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and to are very comfortable even on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: NSF

customer_reviews.title: Good for another 5 years!
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of Merrell Men's Moab Adventure Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots lasted 5 years and countless miles of adventures. Here's to the next 5
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dyas

customer_reviews.title: so dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Merrell shoes because of the previous pair I had and loved. Still wearing with holes in but quality has gone down hill. N
customer_reviews.author: LES

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever owned. My 3 rd pair. Couldnt be happier with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Randall R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: ... shoe is starting to come apart at the webbing nice looking boot but doesn't hold up in Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: Not at all warm and one shoe is starting to come apart at the webbing nice looking boot but doesn't hold up in Minnesota
customer_reviews.author: oliver

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these boots. Didn’t have to break them in. Wore them straight to the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Lacricia Beuhler

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many pairs of Merrill boots and these fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell’s w/Vibram soles always feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Nobody gets a 5 Star because nobody or thing is perfect. Great shoes though. True to fit for me always. Arrived fast with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit just the way like a boot to fit.
customer_reviews.author: David roberts

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They fit wonderful and are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nannie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe. Fits great as do most of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Fits great as do most of the Merrell boots I own.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot!! My other pair lasted me 4 years!! Great comfort, great quality!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfy wellsupported boot
